Room.Name: Wall Road West
Room.ShortDescription: Wall Road West continues to the north and south.
Room.LongDescription: You are at the western most side of the village of Brownhaven, walking beside a high, brown wall. The village took its name from the color of the wall, which was built centuries ago to protect the residents from the marauding mountain trolls. A large clan of trolls live to the north of the village.
